channel.title: University of Texas (R-129)
channel.generator: Function write_rss() in R package nrcadams

item.title: Advises that on 920904,licensee received notification from AFRRI that while moving control rod up,operator pushed pulse mode switch to go into pulse mode & rod continued to move up.Software fix will be available to customers by 920918.
item.author: GENERAL ATOMICS (FORMERLY GA TECHNOLOGIES, INC./GENER

item.title: Informs that LJ Callan has replaced AB Beach as Director,Div of Radiation Safety & Safeguards in Region 4.Requests that future correspondence to region be addressed to listed address.
item.author: NRC OFFICE OF INSPECTION and ENFORCEMENT (IE REGION IV)
